class.name: CSharpScript
class.brief_description: A script implemented in the C# programming language (Mono-enabled builds only).
class.description: This class represents a C# script. It is the C# equivalent of the [GDScript] class and is only available in Mono-enabled Godot builds. See also [GodotSharp].

method.name: new
method.description: Returns a new instance of the script.
